text: Nitrogen oxide may refer to any of these chemical compounds: *Nitrous oxide, +1 oxidation state, sweet-smelling anesthetic sometimes called "laughing gas" *Nitric oxide, +2 oxidation state, used in the body as stimulant *Nitrogen dioxide, +4 oxidation state, brown choking gas *Dinitrogen tetroxide, +4 oxidation state, two nitrogen dioxide molecules bonded together *Dinitrogen pentoxide, +5 oxidation state, made from nitric acid
title: Nitrogen oxide
